>>44273574

“More than. Evidently, it can paralyze and stun the imbiber—and allegedly has other hidden effects, as well, probably if consumed under particular circumstances.” Dorian appears to be closely inspecting a glass of his own. "Though I can't possibly imagine what. A delayed poison? Probably not. Overdose, maybe?"

“So a healing item that you can't use in combat.” Andor says. “Well, at the risk of getting killed. How's your health, Ashe?”

> [[ HP: 32 / 35 ]]

“Almost full.” You respond. “I guess it seems like something that would belong here, game-wise.”

“Kjorikos did want the best for his love, however he went about it.” Ayla says. “I guess he could keep fresh food on hand. Maybe he's got to eat too?”

“I question the choice of drinks for a romantic dinner.” Donnel says. “But, yeah. Game stuff, I guess.”
